page.title: 02A day in the life of Clare.
page.content: A typical Sunday would begin at 7.30 when I get up and have tea and toast for breakfast.Then I get ready for mass.Mass was special today because my brother Nicolas made his First Holy Communion.This is one of the most important days of his life when he received Jesus for the first time. After mass there was a celebration breakast for the children.When we got home my dad took our family to his friends farm in Redditch.We somtimes pick berries or go on long walks.We put out hay for the cows to eat at feeding time,and we watch them being milked. They also have goats and horses at the farm.At 4.30 we have our dinner and afterwards I play games with my brother and sisters.At 6.30 I have a bath and come downstairs to watch the television.At 8.30 I go to bed so that I am not tired in the morning.
